#summary &ugrave character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesU

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesU U] > &ugrave

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ugrave;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d9/index.htm U+000D9].
  * `&Ugrave` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d9/index.htm U+000D9].
  * `&ugrave;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f9/index.htm U+000F9].
  * `&ugrave` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f9/index.htm U+000F9].
